about.title: About Tauri App
about.subtitle: What is Tauri and how it works

story.title: What is Tauri?
story.content: Tauri is a toolkit for building smaller, faster, and more secure desktop applications with web technologies. It allows developers to create cross-platform applications that run natively on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

mission.title: This Template
mission.content: This template combines Tauri v2 with Next.js and React to provide a robust foundation for building modern desktop applications with a great developer experience.

team.title: Technologies
team.content: This application uses Tauri, React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and other modern web technologies to create a seamless development and user experience.
